text: Kikongo or Kongo is the Bantu language spoken by the Bakongo and Bandundu people in the tropical forests of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, the Republic of the Congo and Angola. == Other websites == * Ethnologue entry for the Kongo language * Kongo - English Dictionary Category:Bantu languages Category:Languages of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Republic of the Congo culture Category:Languages of Angola
title: Kongo language
